story.iWant: to monitor emotional tone and potential loneliness or isolation signals
story.soThat: I can provide appropriate support and adjust my approach to their emotional state

context.applies: Every conversation - emotional signals may appear at any time
assumptions: Older adults may experience loneliness or isolation
Emotional state affects conversation quality and needs
Energy levels vary and affect engagement capacity

acceptanceCriteria.title: Mood Assessment
acceptanceCriteria.given: The person is conversing with the companion
acceptanceCriteria.when: Emotional signals are present in the conversation

acceptanceCriteria.title: Energy Assessment
acceptanceCriteria.given: The person is engaging in conversation
acceptanceCriteria.when: Energy levels become apparent through responses

parameters.name: Emotional Tone
parameters.description: The emotional tone and wellbeing signals in the conversation

interpretationScale.label: Low Mood
interpretationScale.implication: Withdrawn, flat affect, brief responses, possible loneliness signals

interpretationScale.label: Neutral Mood
interpretationScale.implication: Stable, engaged but not particularly warm or withdrawn

interpretationScale.label: Positive Mood
interpretationScale.implication: Positive, warm, enjoying the interaction, sharing freely

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Person is in good spirits. Match their warmth, enjoy the conversation, explore what brings them joy.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Person may be feeling low. Be extra warm, ask gently about their day, don't push too hard.

parameters.name: Conversational Energy
parameters.description: The energy level and stamina shown during the conversation

interpretationScale.label: Low Energy
interpretationScale.implication: Tired, shorter responses, may need gentler pacing or wrap-up

interpretationScale.label: Moderate Energy
interpretationScale.implication: Comfortable pace, neither rushing nor flagging

interpretationScale.label: High Energy
interpretationScale.implication: Alert, energetic, wants to continue talking, lots to share

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Person is energetic. Keep the conversation flowing, explore their interests.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Person may be tiring. Slow the pace, consider wrapping up gently, suggest continuing another time.

triggers.name: Emotional Assessment
triggers.given: The person is conversing with the companion
triggers.when: Emotional signals are present in the conversation

actions.description: Measure mood: Positive/warm or withdrawn/flat? Signs of loneliness? Enjoying connection?
Measure energy: Alert and engaged or tired? Does pacing need adjustment?

constraints.description: Be sensitive to signs of distress without being intrusive
